Brooklyn_Park.North Hennepin Community College: North Hennepin Community College, also known as NHCC was founded in 1966 and today stands as one of the largest and most diverse community colleges in Minnesota. It is a member of the Minnesota State Colleges and Universities system, the fifth largest system of higher education in the United States. North Hennepin was ranked the 67 best community college in a list of 700 two year colleges in the nation.
